price: 7. Nee! Waarlijk het boek van de zondaren bevindt zich zeker in Siddjien.
arabic: كَلَّآ إِنَّ كِتَٰبَ ٱلۡفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٖ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: kallā inna kitāba al-fujāri lafī sijjīnin
